Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-49043 affecting package libxml2 for versions less than 2.10.4-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-49043 affecting package libxml2 for versions less than 2.10.4-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libxml2 is earlier than 2.10.4-5, affected by CVE-2022-49043
